docs.summary: This is a service that can manage coupons

params.name: paging.offset
params.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

extra.description: Retrieve coupon templates information for tenant

members.name: multiCyclePercent
members.doc: Idea: Money amount_off = 2;

members.name: amount
members.doc: A positive integer in the smallest currency unit. For example, amount=1000 in USD equals to 1000 cents or $10.00

members.name: currency
members.doc: Three letter ISO currency code. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217

members.name: amount
members.doc: A positive integer in the smallest currency unit. For example, amount=1000 in USD equals to 1000 cents or $10.00

members.name: currency
members.doc: Three letter ISO currency code. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217

messages.name: _com_wixpress_billing_coupons_api_MultiCycleAmountOffRule
messages.displayName: Multi Cycle Amount Off Rule Object

members.name: unit
members.doc: The frequency at which a subscription is billed. One of day, week, month or year. (required)

members.name: count
members.doc: The number of intervals specified in the interval attribute between subscription billings. (required)

docs.summary:
Set of key-value pairs. Key / Value store to keep up to 10 additional values related to the coupon.
 Key max length = 20, Value max length = 100. Value can not be empty.
 In update flow: new key is added, existing key is updated, existing key with empty value will be removed.
 Can be used for example to store the custom data about the product that was purchased with the coupon.
 Stored data is not encrypted so PII is not permitted.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: code
members.doc: Code is unique identifier of coupon. It is immutable. Alphanumeric. Auto-generated if not specified.

members.name: created
members.doc: Auto-generated timestamp when coupon was created

members.name: updated
members.doc: Auto-updated timestamp when coupon was updated

members.name: bulkId
members.doc: Bulk coupon belongs to.  Immutable. Coupon assigned to bulk during creation.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of the coupon for display purposes

members.name: description
members.doc: Description of the coupon for display purposes

members.name: enabled
members.doc: Indicates whether coupon can is enabled. By default the coupon is created as enabled, Disabled coupons cannot be redeemed

members.name: useLimit
members.doc: How many times coupon can be redeemed. Optional. If not specified, coupon is unlimited.

members.name: useCount
members.doc: How many times coupon was redeemed. Can not be updated. Increased each redeem call

members.name: validFrom
members.doc: Can be redeemed from this date (UTC). If not specified during creation, initialized with creation timestamp.

members.name: expiresOn
members.doc: Can be redeemed until this date (UTC), If not specified, coupon never expires.

members.name: discountRule
members.doc: Discount rule of coupon. Mandatory part of coupon.

members.name: createdBy
members.doc: Entity that issued the coupon. For example, user, subscription

members.name: appliesTo
members.doc: Entities which the coupon can be applied on. For example, products

members.name: assignedTo
members.doc: Entities which the coupon is assigned to. For example, users

members.name: metadata
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs. Key / Value store to keep up to 10 additional values related to the coupon.
 Key max length = 20, Value max length = 100. Value can not be empty.
 In update flow: new key is added, existing key is updated, existing key with empty value will be removed.
 Can be used for example to store the custom data about the product that was purchased with the coupon.
 Stored data is not encrypted so PII is not permitted.

members.name: category
members.doc: Arbitrary category of which the entity with specified id belongs to. For example, "product", "service", "user"

members.name: id
members.doc: Arbitrary id of entity managed externally. For example, can be product guid.

members.name: codePrefix
members.doc: Optional coupon code prefix to be added to the generated coupon code

members.name: duration
members.doc: How long will the generated coupon be valid, if not given then unlimited

members.name: name
members.doc: Name coupon created from template will get

members.name: description
members.doc: Description coupon created from template will get

members.name: useLimit
members.doc: How many times generated coupon can be redeemed.

members.name: discountRule
members.doc: Discount rule of generated coupon. Mandatory for template creation.

members.name: appliesTo
members.doc: Entities which the coupon can be applied on.

members.name: id
members.doc: Id is unique identifier of coupon template.

members.name: created
members.doc: Auto-generated timestamp when coupon template was created

members.name: updated
members.doc: Auto-updated timestamp when coupon template was updated

members.name: status
members.doc: Status of the template for catalog purposes

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: paging
members.doc: paging of the services to be retrieved (default offset is 0, default limit is 50, maximum allowed limit is 100)

members.name: appliesTo
members.doc: template applies to entity

members.name: status
members.doc: template status

members.name: ids
members.doc: template ids

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs.  General-purpose key-value store of properties attributed to the generated coupon

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: id
members.doc: template id to be used in order to generate a coupon

members.name: createdBy
members.doc: created-by entity will be set to generated coupon

members.name: assignedTo
members.doc: generated coupon will be assigned to these entities

members.name: validFrom
members.doc: if provided, valid from of generated coupon will have this date

members.name: metadata
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs.  General-purpose key-value store of properties attributed to the generated coupon

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Return only coupons that include the specified metadata. If empty, the match is skipped

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: metadata
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Return only coupons that include the specified metadata. If empty, the match is skipped

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Return only coupons that include the specified metadata. If empty, the match is skipped

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: assignedTo
members.doc: This Entity represent typically a user.

members.name: createdBy
members.doc: Entity that issued the coupon. For example, user, subscription. If empty, the match is skipped.

members.name: appliesTo
members.doc:
applies_to represent typically a product/products that are bought.
 This is a "OR" list of entities to a coupon can apply to. If empty, the match is skipped.

members.name: metadata
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Return only coupons that include the specified metadata. If empty, the match is skipped

members.name: assignedTo
members.doc: mandatory field; this Entity represent typically a user

members.name: appliesTo
members.doc: applies_to represent typically a product/products that are bought.

members.name: currency
members.doc: For coupons based on amounts (like AmountOffRule, MultiCycleAmountOffRule), the currency needs to match

members.name: cycleUnit
members.doc: Use cycle & one_time instead

members.name: cycle
members.doc: repetitive interval

members.name: oneTime
members.doc: one time

members.name: isValid
members.doc: true if no errors are found

members.name: errorCodes
members.doc: list of all error found

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • DAILY
  • MONTHLY
  • YEARLY
  • TWO_YEARS
  • THREE_YEARS

Interval unit of recurring Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • DAY
  • WEEK
  • MONTH
  • YEAR

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • HOURS
  • DAYS
  • WEEKS
  • MONTHS
  • YEARS

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • DRAFT
  • PUBLISHED - active template that can't be changed anymore
  • ARCHIVED - non-active template that also can't be changed anymore

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_FAILURE
  • ASSIGNED_TO_MISMATCH
  • APPLIES_TO_MISMATCH
  • LIMIT_USAGE_REACHED
  • NOT_YET_EFFECTIVE
  • EXPIRED
  • CYCLE_UNIT_MISMATCH
  • CURRENCY_MISMATCH
  • DISABLED
